Package voltage.processors

Class Limiter

java.lang.Object
voltage.processors.Limiter
public class Limiter
extends java.lang.Object
A type of compressor designed to limit the signal to a certain threshold.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    Limiter()
    Construct a Limiter

  • Method Summary

    Gets the attack time in milliseconds

  • Constructor Details

    • Limiter

      public Limiter()
      Construct a Limiter

  • Method Details

    • SetThresholdDecibels

      public void SetThresholdDecibels​(double dB)
      Set the threshold level by decibals
      Parameters:
      dB - the decibels to limit at. Valid range is from -Inf to 0.0

    • SetThresholdPercent

      public void SetThresholdPercent​(double percent)
      Set the threshold level by percent.
      Parameters:
      percent - the percent of maximum amplitude to limit to. (Useful range is from 0 to 100)

    • SetAttackTime

      public void SetAttackTime​(double ms)
      Sets the attack time of the limiter. Slower attack results in smoother limiting. Fast attack results in hard and drastic limiting.
      Parameters:
      ms - attack time in milliseconds

    • SetReleaseTime

      public void SetReleaseTime​(double ms)
      Set the release time of the limiter. Slower release times make for a smoother transition to the original signal.
      Parameters:
      ms - release time in milliseconds.

    • GetThresholdDecibels

      public double GetThresholdDecibels()
      Gets the threshold in decibels.
      Returns:
      the threshold in dB.

    • GetThresholdPercent

      public double GetThresholdPercent()
      Gets the threshold in percentage.
      Returns:
      the threshold in percentage.

    • GetAttackTime

      public double GetAttackTime()
      Gets the attack time in milliseconds
      Returns:
      the attack time in milliseconds.

    • GetReleaseTime

      public double GetReleaseTime()
      Gets the release time in milliseconds
      Returns:
      the release time in milliseconds.

    • GetGain

      public double GetGain()
      Gets the gain amount.
      Returns:
      the gain amount.

    • Reset

      public void Reset()
      Resets the limiter.

    • ProcessSample

      public double ProcessSample​(double sampleIn)
      Process a sample. Typical use is to call this once per VoltageModule.ProcessSample()
      Parameters:
      sampleIn - the input sample.
      Returns:
      the limited and processed sample.

    • ProcessSample

      public void ProcessSample​(double[] stereoSamplesIn)
      Process a stereo sample.
      Parameters:
      stereoSamplesIn - an array of doubles. Array must have two elements. stereoSamplesIn[0] is the left channel value and stereoSamplesIn[1] is the right channel value.
